pr_title: CDAP-17166 fix bug where num executors was being ignored

timeline.author: CuriousVini

replies.bodyText:
it was +2 before as a default to allow 2 executors to process the data, but the actual minimum is +1.
I think I should change the logic a little so that the default stays the same unless it's in these properties. Will make the change.
replies.author: albertshau

timeline.message:
CDAP-17166 fix bug where num executors was being ignored

Fixed a bug in streaming pipelines where the default number of
executors was overwriting the number explicitly set by the user.
